source_text: Upon completion of the farm-in, the parties will form an unincorporated joint venture with WYX as manager and the parties may contribute their pro rata share of expenditure or be diluted according to standard dilution provisions unless Bellpark elects at that time to convert its participating interest to a 1.5% net smelt return (NSR) royalty on production of minerals from the Tenements.
additional_details: Bellpark (or its nominee) receives the royalty. It is paid on production of minerals from the Tenements by the joint venture (managed by WYX).
